#summary &boxur; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxur;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxUR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255a/index.htm U+0255A].
  * `&boxUr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2559/index.htm U+02559].
  * `&boxuR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2558/index.htm U+02558].
  * `&boxur;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2514/index.htm U+02514].
